body.name: Mattel Disney Frozen 3-Doll Charades Set with Fashion Dolls Anna,Elsa and Kristoff,Plus Posable Olaf Figure and 12 Accessories from Disney’s Frozen 2
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 8 mins
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 8 mins
features: Inspired by the hilarious charades scene in Disney's Frozen 2, the Charades Party Pack includes 3 dolls, Olaf and 12 storytelling pieces!
Set includes posable Anna and Elsa fashion dolls in removable fabric fashions and slippers, plus a posable Kristoff doll in a soft top and removable slippers.
The fun continues with everyone's favorite snowman, Olaf! Posable Olaf figure has mix and match pieces for creating different charades poses.
Anna and Elsa dolls both feature long braids and include a brush for styling fun. Set also includes 12 accessories, like fun character cards and a basket.
With the 4 friends together in one set, this makes a perfect gift for kids to play out their favorite Disney Frozen 2 scenes or make up their own exciting adventures!
Fans can collect all the Disney Frozen fashion dolls and accessories to imagine adventures in Arendelle and beyond! Each sold separately, subject to availability.
body.description: Disney fans will delight in this charades party doll set, inspired by the memorable charades scene in Disney's Frozen 2! Set includes 3 fashion dollsAnna, Elsa, and Kristoff, in outfits inspired by the sceneplus an Olaf figure with mix and match pieces for transforming him into hilarious poses. Kids will love re-creating this favorite movie moment or imagining new stories for this beloved cast of characters. Dolls cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Disney Frozen dolls are inspired by the animated characters that kids love. Each doll celebrates the fashions of these beloved characters, with signature looks and sparkling details that kids will recognize from their favorite movie moments! Iconic locations and scenes from Disney Frozen come to life in playsets for both fashion and small dolls! Each playset is filled with a flurry of storytelling moments and discoveries. Disney Frozen offers innovative ways to play out favorite moments and new adventures. Whether it’s color change, transformation or reveals, kids will delight in all the magical surprises!
With unforgettable characters and movie moments that inspire kids to dream and grow, Disney Frozen toys help kids re-create their favorite Frozen scenes and imagine new adventures of their own!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Warehouse Does it again!
reviews.reviewText: This was sold out at other online retailers, but I was able to get this from the Amazon Warehouse for even less than I had seen it for other places. It arrived quickly and in great shape. My niece was thrilled to get this for her birthday. Great set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice toys with clothes. Bought two sets so my kids don't fight over them. Nice to have the main characters as a set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our 4 year old loves them! We got them as one of her Christmas gifts. She loves frozen and these are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted this for christmas. I love that Olaf is included. I thought it was a really good price for the amount of characters. We purchased the adult characters box and the child characters box. I had previously bought her Elsa and Anna in Walmart for almost the same price as this set. This set includes Kristoff and Olaf, as well as accessories. I think it's a really good bargain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great playset, but remove the hair brush from it
reviews.reviewText: My grandkids absolutely loved this and I could hardly get it out of the package fast enough after they unwrapped it. They love playing with the figures and re-creating the scenes in the movies. My 4 year old likes to dress and undress her Barbie dolls and she did the same with these characters. The clothing is not really meant to be removed and replaced because they fit kind of tight. The only problem we have had with it is the hairbrush that is included in the kit. Kristoff's hair cannot be combed and Elsa and Anna both have braided hair. It wasn't long before Anna's braids were combed out with the hairbrush. We caught her and prevented Anna from suffering the same fate. That hair is awfully short to try to re-braid so Elsa will have to live with it. My advice is to remove the hairbrush from the kit. There are also a lot of little pieces that really do not have a place to go, so have a ziplock bag handy for them.
Vraiment un très beau coffret pour offrir. Les poupées sont magnifiques
